item.description: This is a beautiful place with streams, beaver dam, and waterfall. Join us for a walk outdoors on a nice spring day. Afterward, weâ€™ll go for lunch locally at a nice restaurant. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to walk: I-84W Exit 38 (Rt. 6 Bristol), go about 6-7 miles (pass Home Depot, Stop & Shop, then Blockbuster), at RR tracks, turn right onto Burlington Avenue (Rt. 69) for 3.7 miles, turn left at the sign for Sessions Woods Wildlife Area. Go up hill, parking lot on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the parking lot waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
